We examined the effect of dietary supplementation on the intestinal DC phenotype. The results of this analysis were presented in Figure 17. The administration of fermented milk with L. paracasei only, as well as with L. paracasei and S. thermophilus in the lowest and highest doses produced a statistically significant reduction in the expression of CD80 and CD86, as compared to the mice in the control group (* mean p <0.05 vs. control), while HLAII and CD40 levels, in general, remained stable. The data in Figure 17 were expressed as mean standard error of the three separate experiments.

[00168] Respostas das clulas dendrticas expostas a LPS/CpG. Ns determinamos a habilidade da suplementao diettica de modificar a reatividade das DCs a estmulos pr-inflamatrios (como LPS bacteriano e CpG). Conforme demonstrado na Figura 18, a exposio de DCs isoladas de animais controle a LPS e CpG causou aumento significativo na expresso de CD80 (*mdia p < 0,05 vs. DCs no estimuladas de camundongos controle). Um efeito similar foi observado nas DCs purificadas de camundongos que receberam leite no fermentado (mdia p < 0,05 vs. DCs no estimuladas de camundongos tratados com leite no fermentado). A administrao de leite desnatado fermentado com L. paracasei CBA L74 apenas preveniu completamente os efeitos mediados por LPS em camundongos tratados com leite no fermentado, embora tenha sido menos efetivo na regulao ascendente de CD80 induzida por CpG. Leite desnatado fermentado com S. thermophilus apenas preveniu os efeitos de LPS e CpG, e reduziu a expresso de CD80. Por fim, a administrao de leite desnatado fermentado por ambas as cepas preveniu a regulao ascendente de CD80 induzida por LPS e CpG, e manteve a expresso de CD80 nos nveis basais. Os dados na Figura 18 foram expressos como mdia erro padro dos trs experimentos separados. Exemplo 11: Efeito do leite fermentado por L. paracasei CBA L74 no fentipo dos linfcitos T na mucosa intestinal[00168] Responses of dendritic cells exposed to LPS / CpG. We determined the ability of dietary supplementation to modify the reactivity of DCs to pro-inflammatory stimuli (such as bacterial LPS and CpG). As shown in Figure 18, the exposure of DCs isolated from control animals to LPS and CpG caused a significant increase in CD80 expression (* mean p <0.05 vs. unstimulated DCs from control mice). A similar effect was observed in the purified DCs of mice that received unfermented milk (mean p <0.05 vs. unstimulated DCs of mice treated with unfermented milk). The administration of skimmed milk fermented with L. paracasei CBA L74 only completely prevented the effects mediated by LPS in mice treated with unfermented milk, although it was less effective in the upward regulation of CpG-induced CD80. Skimmed milk fermented with S. thermophilus only prevented the effects of LPS and CpG, and reduced the expression of CD80. Finally, the administration of skimmed fermented milk by both strains prevented the upward regulation of CD80 induced by LPS and CpG, and maintained the expression of CD80 at baseline levels. The data in Figure 18 were expressed as mean standard error of the three separate experiments. Example 11: Effect of milk fermented by L. paracasei CBA L74 on the phenotype of T lymphocytes in the intestinal mucosa

[00169] Respostas dos linfcitos intestinais CD4+ e CD8+ expostos PHA. Indagamos se a suplementao de leite (fermentado ou no fermentado) na dieta poderia afetar a polarizao dos linfcitos T intestinais (CD4+ e CD8+) com relao ao fentipo Th1 ou Th2. As Placas de Peyer derivadas dos linfcitos foram expostas PHA, e ento, a polarizao dos linfcitos foi avaliada por colorao para IL-4 e IFN-y intracelular.[00169] Responses of intestinal lymphocytes CD4 + and CD8 + exposed to PHA. We asked if the supplementation of milk (fermented or non-fermented) in the diet could affect the polarization of intestinal T lymphocytes (CD4 + and CD8 +) with respect to the Th1 or Th2 phenotype. Lymphocyte-derived Peyer Plates were exposed to PHA, and then lymphocyte polarization was assessed by staining for intracellular IL-4 and IFN-y.

[00170] Conforme demonstrado na Figura 19, a exposio PHA aumentou significantemente a produo de IL4 e IFNy nos linfcitos CD4+ dos camundongos do grupo de controle (*mdia p < 0,05 vs. linfcitos no estimulados dos camundongos do grupo de controle). Essa induo no foi observada nos camundongos tratados com leite no fermentado ou fermentado. Aps suplementao com leite no fermentado, os linfcitos CD4+ demonstraram nveis basais mais altos de IL4 e IFNy comparado aos animais do grupo de controle (mdia p < 0,05 vs. linfcitos no estimulados dos camundongos controle). Esses dados sugerem que a suplementao com leite fermentado preveniu a ativao no especfica e manteve a produo de IL4 e IFNy nos nveis basais.[00170] As shown in Figure 19, exposure to PHA significantly increased the production of IL4 and IFNy in the CD4 + lymphocytes of the mice in the control group (* mean p <0.05 vs. unstimulated lymphocytes of the mice in the control group) . This induction was not observed in mice treated with unfermented or fermented milk. After supplementation with unfermented milk, CD4 + lymphocytes demonstrated higher baseline levels of IL4 and IFNy compared to animals in the control group (mean p <0.05 vs. unstimulated lymphocytes in control mice). These data suggest that fermented milk supplementation prevented non-specific activation and maintained the production of IL4 and IFNy at baseline levels.

[00171] Conforme demonstrado na Figura 20, a exposio PHA nos linfcitos intestinais CD8+ dos camundongos do grupo de controle aumentou a produo de IL4 e IFNy (*mdia p < 0,05 vs. linfcitos no estimulados dos camundongos do grupo de controle). Essa induo no foi observada nos camundongos tratados com leite no fermentado ou fermentado. A administrao de leite fermentado com L. paracasei e S. thermophilus na dose mais alta reduziu a produo basal de IL4, ao passo que aps estimulao com PHA, os nveis de IL4 e IFNy foram reduzidos, conforme comparado aos linfcitos estimulados dos camundongos controle ( mdia p < 0,05). Exemplo 12: Efeito do leite fermentado por L. paracasei CBA L74 na histologia da mucosa intestinal[00171] As shown in Figure 20, exposure to PHA in CD8 + intestinal lymphocytes in the mice in the control group increased IL4 and IFNy production (* mean p <0.05 vs. unstimulated lymphocytes in the mice in the control group) . This induction was not observed in mice treated with unfermented or fermented milk. The administration of fermented milk with L. paracasei and S. thermophilus at the highest dose reduced the basal production of IL4, whereas after stimulation with PHA, the levels of IL4 and IFNy were reduced, as compared to the stimulated lymphocytes of the control mice ( mean p <0.05). Example 12: Effect of milk fermented by L. paracasei CBA L74 on the histology of the intestinal mucosa

[00172] A fim de determinar a distribuio de clulas proliferativas na mucosa intestinal, ns realizamos uma anlise imunohistoqumica da expresso de Ki67, um antgeno expresso pelas clulas em diviso. Nos camundongos controle, houve uma imunorreatividade evidente nas criptas intestinais, ao passo que no houve colorao nas vilosidades. No tecido dos camundongos que receberam leite no fermentado, houve uma forte expresso nas criptas, embora no tenha havido expresso ectpica do antgeno. Nos camundongos que receberam o tipo diferente de leite fermentado, ns observamos padres comparveis de colorao. Realizamos uma avaliao histolgica da mucosa do leo de diferentes grupos experimentais. Os resultados desse estudo foram apresentados na Figura 21. A administrao de leite no fermentado reduziu o nmero e o comprimento das vilosidades intestinais, ao passo que a morfologia intestinal foi preservada nos animais que receberam as vrias formas do leite fermentado. Exemplo 13: Efeito do arroz fermentado por L. paracasei CBA L74 nos marcadores do sistema imune na mucosa intestinal[00172] In order to determine the distribution of proliferative cells in the intestinal mucosa, we performed an immunohistochemical analysis of the expression of Ki67, an antigen expressed by the dividing cells. In the control mice, there was an evident immunoreactivity in the intestinal crypts, whereas there was no staining in the villi. In the tissue of mice that received unfermented milk, there was a strong expression in the crypts, although there was no ectopic expression of the antigen. In mice that received the different type of fermented milk, we observed comparable color patterns. We performed a histological evaluation of the ileum mucosa from different experimental groups. The results of this study are shown in Figure 21. Administration of unfermented milk reduced the number and length of intestinal villi, while intestinal morphology was preserved in animals that received the various forms of fermented milk. Example 13: Effect of rice fermented by L. paracasei CBA L74 on immune system markers in the intestinal mucosa

[00173] Esses experimentos foram criados para avaliar as propriedades imunomoduladoras de cereais fermentados por L. paracasei CBA L74. Os estudos incluram a administrao diria intragstrica por duas semanas de: 1) Arroz no fermentado; 2) Arroz fermentado (com L. paracasei CBA L74) 100 mg por dia (correspondendo a 2 x108 UFC/L de L. paracasei CBA L74); e 3) Arroz fermentado (com L. paracasei CBA L74) 500 mg por dia (correspondendo a 109 UFC/L de L. paracasei CBA L74). Durante o perodo de tratamento, os camundongos no apresentaram nenhum sinal de doena ou diarreia. Ao final do tratamento, os camundongos foram mortos e as Placas de Peyer (PP) foram coletadas de forma assptica. As clulas do epitlio foram removidas da PP por incubao em HBSS sem Ca2+ mais EDTA, e os tecidos foram submetidos digesto enzimtica. A suspenso de nica clula foi lavada, ressuspendida em RMPI frio e utilizada para os seguintes testes.[00173] These experiments were created to evaluate the immunomodulatory properties of cereals fermented by L. paracasei CBA L74. The studies included daily intragastric administration for two weeks of: 1) Unfermented rice; 2) Fermented rice (with L. paracasei CBA L74) 100 mg per day (corresponding to 2 x108 CFU / L of L. paracasei CBA L74); and 3) Fermented rice (with L. paracasei CBA L74) 500 mg per day (corresponding to 109 CFU / L of L. paracasei CBA L74). During the treatment period, the mice showed no signs of illness or diarrhea. At the end of the treatment, the mice were killed and the Peyer Plates (PP) were collected aseptically. Epithelial cells were removed from PP by incubation in HBSS without Ca2 + plus EDTA, and the tissues were subjected to enzymatic digestion. The single cell suspension was washed, resuspended in cold RMPI and used for the following tests.

[00174] Ns inicialmente examinamos o efeito dos diferentes suplementos dietticos em toda a mucosa intestinal. Primeiro, realizamos colorao por hematoxilina e eosina em cortes do leo embebidos em parafina. Nenhum dos suplementos dietticos utilizados teve efeitos significativos na arquitetura intestinal ou causou um infiltrado de clulas inflamatrias.[00174] We initially examined the effect of different dietary supplements on the entire intestinal mucosa. First, we performed hematoxylin and eosin staining in paraffin-embedded sections of the ileum. None of the dietary supplements used had significant effects on intestinal architecture or caused an infiltration of inflammatory cells.

[00175] Posteriormente, determinamos se a administrao de arroz fermentado por L. paracasei CBA L74 afetou o nvel de citocinas anti- e pr- inflamatrias na mucosa intestinal. Conforme demonstrado na Figura 22, a administrao de arroz ou arroz fermentado aumentou IL-1 e IL-4 na mucosa. A suplementao com arroz fermentado na dose mais alta causou uma reduo em IL- 10, conforme demonstrado na Figura 23.[00175] Subsequently, we determined whether the administration of fermented rice by L. paracasei CBA L74 affected the level of anti- and pro-inflammatory cytokines in the intestinal mucosa. As shown in Figure 22, administration of rice or fermented rice increased IL-1 and IL-4 in the mucosa. Supplementation with fermented rice at the highest dose caused a reduction in IL-10, as shown in Figure 23.

[00176] Determinamos o efeito de diferentes regimes de suplementao no nvel de IgA na mucosa. Aps duas semanas de suplementao na dieta, os animais foram sacrificados e a mucosa intestinal foi coletada e homogeneizada. A IgA total foi ento medida por ELISA e os valores foram normalizados para as protenas totais na mucosa. Nenhum dos suplementos teve efeitos significativos na IgA da mucosa.[00176] We determined the effect of different supplementation regimes on the level of IgA in the mucosa. After two weeks of supplementation in the diet, the animals were sacrificed and the intestinal mucosa was collected and homogenized. Total IgA was then measured by ELISA and the values were normalized for total proteins in the mucosa. None of the supplements had significant effects on mucosal IgA.

[00177] Ns analisamos os efeitos do arroz ou do arroz fermentado por L. paracasei CBA L74 na imunidade inata da mucosa intestinal. Conforme demonstrado na Figura 24, a suplementao de arroz e arroz fermentado (baixa dose) na dieta apresentou apenas efeitos moderados nos TLRs da mucosa. Conforme demonstrado na Figura 25a, a suplementao de arroz no fermentado na dieta aumentou drasticamente os nveis de PPARy na mucosa. Altas doses de arroz fermentado tambm aumentaram os nveis de PPARy na mucosa. Conforme demonstrado na Figura 25b, duas semanas de suplementao de arroz no fermentado na dieta reduziu a ativao de NF-kB e aumentou IKB na mucosa. A suplementao com arroz fermentado em baixas doses no apresentou efeito comparado aos controles, ao passo que a dose mais alta teve efeitos comparveis aos observados com o arroz no fermentado.[00177] We analyzed the effects of rice or rice fermented by L. paracasei CBA L74 on innate immunity of the intestinal mucosa. As shown in Figure 24, supplementation of rice and fermented rice (low dose) in the diet showed only moderate effects on the mucosa TLRs. As shown in Figure 25a, supplementation of unfermented rice in the diet dramatically increased the levels of PPARy in the mucosa. High doses of fermented rice also increased the levels of PPARy in the mucosa. As shown in Figure 25b, two weeks of supplementation of unfermented rice in the diet reduced the activation of NF-kB and increased IKB in the mucosa. Supplementation with rice fermented in low doses had no effect compared to controls, whereas the higher dose had effects comparable to those observed with unfermented rice.

[00178] Tambm medimos os efeitos da administrao na dieta no nvel de citocinas anti- e pr-inflamatrias no soro. A suplementao diettica com arroz ou arroz fermentado (baixa dose) no teve influncia nos nveis de IL-1 e IL-4 no soro.Exemplo 14: Efeito do arroz fermentado por L. paracasei CBA L74 no fentipo das clulas dendrticas na mucosa intestinal[00178] We also measured the effects of administration in the diet on the level of anti- and pro-inflammatory cytokines in the serum. Dietary supplementation with rice or fermented rice (low dose) had no influence on the levels of IL-1 and IL-4 in the serum. Example 14: Effect of rice fermented by L. paracasei CBA L74 on the phenotype of dendritic cells in the intestinal mucosa

[00179] Posteriormente, direcionamos o nosso foco para o impacto da suplementao na dieta com arroz no fermentado ou arroz fermentado com L. paracasei CBA L74 sobre as clulas imunes relevantes atividade do sistema imune associado mucosa, especificamente clulas dendrticas e linfcitos. Primeiramente, ns marcamos a suspenso de clulas nicas com anti-CD1 (para identificar as DCs) e com anti-CD80 e CD-86, MHC-II e CD-40 para determinar o nvel de atividade e maturidade da DC intestinal nesses rgos linfoides. Supplementation with unfermented rice (in these experiments we used two different doses) had no effect, whereas the effects of fermented rice at the level of CD80, CD40 and MHC-II were evident at 100 mg / day and more pronounced at 500 mg /day.

[00180] Ns ento determinamos a habilidade da suplementao com arroz fermentado por L. paracasei CBA L74 na dieta de modificar a reatividade das DCs a estmulos pr-inflamatrios (como LPS bacteriano e CpG). Exemplo 15: Efeito do arroz fermentado por L. paracasei CBA L74 no fentipo dos linfcitos T na mucosa intestinal[00180] We then determined the ability of supplementation with rice fermented by L. paracasei CBA L74 in the diet to modify the reactivity of DCs to pro-inflammatory stimuli (such as bacterial LPS and CpG). As shown in the Table in Figure 27, exposure of the DCs of mice in the control group to LPS or CpG induced a strong upward regulation of CD80 in the DCs of control animals. Supplementation with unfermented rice did not change the reactivity to inflammatory stimuli. Supplementation with the tested dose of fermented rice reduced the upward regulation of CD80 induced by LPS and CpG. Example 15: Effect of rice fermented by L. paracasei CBA L74 on the phenotype of T lymphocytes in the intestinal mucosa

[00181] Ns investigamos se a suplementao na dieta com arroz ou arroz fermentado por L. paracasei CBA L74 foi capaz de influenciar a polarizao dos linfcitos T do intestino (CD4+ e CD8+) com relao ao fentipo Th1 ou Th2. Lymphocyte-derived Peyer Plates were exposed to PHA, and then lymphocyte polarization was assessed by intracin staining for IL-4 and IFN-y.

[00182] Os resultados desse experimento dos linfcitos CD4+ e CD8+ foram apresentados nas Figuras 28 e 29, respectivamente. Conforme demonstrado na Figura 28, na condio basal, IL-4 e IFNy nos linfcitos CD4+ ficaram quase em equilbrio, pois cerca de 10-12% das clulas foram positivas para essas citocinas. As shown in Figure 29, in CD8 +, at baseline, there was a slight predominance of IL-4 expression cells over IFNy. The exposure of CD4 + or CD8 + lymphocytes to PHA caused a strong increase in intracellular staining for IL-4 and IFN-y, with predominance for IFN-y production.

[00183] Nos camundongos que receberam arroz no fermentado, ns observamos uma preponderncia da produo de IL-4 (fentipo Th2) na condio basal e aps estimulao com PHA para ambos os linfcitos CD4+ e CD8+. Entretanto, a produo de IL-4 esteve associada persistncia da produo de IFNy na condio basal e, aps estimulao com PHA, observamos maior expresso dessa citocina, embora a resposta tenha sido fraca quando comparada resposta nas clulas controle. Nos camundongos que receberam arroz fermentado na condio basal, ns observamos uma preponderncia de clulas positivas para IFNy com relao a IL-4, embora, na condio basal, a porcentagem tenha sido comparvel (para CD4+) ou discretamente menor (para CD8+) quando comparada aos controles. Aps estimulao com PHA, em ambas as populaes celulares, a resposta da citocina foi fraca quando comparada aos camundongos controle, embora direcionada a um fentipo Th1 (preponderncia de clulas positivas para IFNy).Exemplo 16: Efeito de L. paracasei CBA L74 na produo de IL-10 em clulas dendrticas derivadas de moncitos (MoDCs) na presena de Salmonella typhimurium[00183] In mice that received unfermented rice, we observed a preponderance of IL-4 production (Th2 phenotype) at baseline and after stimulation with PHA for both CD4 + and CD8 + lymphocytes. However, the production of IL-4 was associated with the persistence of IFNy production at baseline and, after stimulation with PHA, we observed a greater expression of this cytokine, although the response was weak when compared to the response in the control cells. In mice that received fermented rice at baseline, we observed a preponderance of IFNy positive cells over IL-4, although at baseline the percentage was comparable (for CD4 +) or slightly lower (for CD8 +) when compared controls. After stimulation with PHA, in both cell populations, the cytokine response was weak when compared to control mice, although directed to a Th1 phenotype (preponderance of IFNy positive cells). Example 16: Effect of L. paracasei CBA L74 on the production of IL-10 in monocyte-derived dendritic cells (MoDCs) in the presence of Salmonella typhimurium

[00184] Ns testamos a habilidade das clulas de L. paracasei CBA L74 e dos sobrenadantes das clulas de L. paracasei CBA L74 de induzir a produo da citocina anti-inflamatria, IL-10, em MoDCs humanas na presena do patgeno bacteriano, Salmonella typhimurium. MoDCs humanas foram obtidas de pelo menos quatro e, em alguns casos, sete doadores. Conforme demonstrado na Figura 30, clulas de Salmonella typhimurium (FB62), da cepa controle Lactobacillus, de L. paracasei 21060 (B21060) e de L. paracasei CBA L74 (CBAL74) induziram a produo de IL-10. Em contraste, embora o sobrenadante de Salmonella typhimurium (sn fb62) tenha induzido a produo de IL-10, os sobrenadantes de ambas as cepas de Lactobacilli, cepa Lactobacillus, L. paracasei 21060 (sn b21060) e L. paracasei CBA L74 (sn cbal74) no a induziram. A coincubao do sobrenadante de L. paracasei CBA L74 com Salmonella typhimurium (sn cbal74 + FB62) induziu IL-10 a nveis alm e acima dos observados com Salmonella typhimurium apenas (sn fb62 + FB62). De forma interessante, um efeito semelhante foi observado at mesmo quando as MoDCs foram condicionadas com o sobrenadante de L. paracasei CBA L74 por apenas uma hora e ento lavadas para remoo do sobrenadante (1h sn cbal74 + FB62). Exemplo 17: Efeito de L. paracasei CBA L74 na produo de IL-12p70 em clulas dendrticas derivadas de moncitos (MoDCs) na presena de Salmonella typhimurium[00184] We tested the ability of L. paracasei CBA L74 cells and the supernatants of L. paracasei CBA L74 cells to induce the production of the anti-inflammatory cytokine, IL-10, in human MoDCs in the presence of the bacterial pathogen, Salmonella typhimurium. Human MoDCs were obtained from at least four and, in some cases, seven donors. As shown in Figure 30, cells of Salmonella typhimurium (FB62), the control strain Lactobacillus, L. paracasei 21060 (B21060) and L. paracasei CBA L74 (CBAL74) induced the production of IL-10 . In contrast, although the Salmonella typhimurium supernatant (sn fb62) induced the production of IL-10, the supernatants of both strains of Lactobacilli, strain Lactobacillus, L. paracasei 21060 (sn b21060) and L. paracasei CBA L74 (sn cbal74) did not induce it. The coincubation of the L. paracasei CBA L74 supernatant with Salmonella typhimurium (sn cbal74 + FB62) induced IL-10 to levels above and above those observed with Salmonella typhimurium only (sn fb62 + FB62). Interestingly, a similar effect was observed even when MoDCs were conditioned with the L. paracasei CBA L74 supernatant for just one hour and then washed to remove the supernatant (1h sn cbal74 + FB62). Example 17: Effect of L. paracasei CBA L74 on the production of IL-12p70 in monocyte-derived dendritic cells (MoDCs) in the presence of Salmonella typhimurium

[00185] Ns testamos a habilidade das clulas de L. paracasei CBA L74 e dos sobrenadantes das clulas de L. paracasei CBA L74 de induzir a produo da citocina pr-inflamatria, IL-12p70, em MoDCs humanas na presena do patgeno bacteriano, Salmonella typhimurium. MoDCs humanas foram obtidas de pelo menos quatro e, em alguns casos, sete doadores. Os resultados desse experimento foram apresentados na Figura 31. Em contraste com os resultados obtidos no Exemplo 16 para a citocina anti-inflamatria, descobrimos que a Salmonella typhimurium (FB62) induziu altos nveis de Il-12p70, ao passo que as clulas da cepa controle Lactobacillus, de L. paracasei 21060 (B21060) e de L. paracasei CBA L74 (CBAL74) induziram apenas baixos nveis de IL-12p70. Aqui, novamente, o sobrenadante de Salmonella typhimurium (sn fb62) induziu a produo de IL- 12p70, mas os sobrenadantes de ambas as cepas de Lactobacillus, L. paracasei 21060 (sn b21060) e L. paracasei CBA L74 (sn cbal74), no a induziram. A coincubao do sobrenadante de L. paracasei CBA L74 com Salmonella typhimurium (sn cbal74 + FB62) causou grande reduo na produo de IL-12p70. O efeito foi observado mesmo quando as MoDCs foram pr-condicionadas com o sobrenadante de L. paracasei CBA L74 por apenas uma hora e ento lavadas para remoo do sobrenadante (1h sn cbal74 + FB62). Essa reduo excedeu aquela observada para o controle Lactobacillus, L. paracasei 21060 (1h sn b21060 + FB62).[00185] We tested the ability of L. paracasei CBA L74 cells and the supernatants of L. paracasei CBA L74 cells to induce the production of the pro-inflammatory cytokine, IL-12p70, in human MoDCs in the presence of the bacterial pathogen, Salmonella typhimurium. Human MoDCs were obtained from at least four and, in some cases, seven donors. The results of this experiment are shown in Figure 31. In contrast to the results obtained in Example 16 for the anti-inflammatory cytokine, we found that Salmonella typhimurium (FB62) induced high levels of Il-12p70, whereas cells in the control strain Lactobacillus, L. paracasei 21060 (B21060) and L. paracasei CBA L74 (CBAL74) induced only low levels of IL-12p70. Here again, the Salmonella typhimurium supernatant (sn fb62) induced the production of IL-12p70, but the supernatants of both strains of Lactobacillus, L. paracasei 21060 (sn b21060) and L. paracasei CBA L74 ( Sn cbal74), did not induce it. The coincubation of the L. paracasei CBA L74 supernatant with Salmonella typhimurium (sn cbal74 + FB62) caused a great reduction in the production of IL-12p70. The effect was observed even when MoDCs were preconditioned with the L. paracasei CBA L74 supernatant for just one hour and then washed to remove the supernatant (1h sn cbal74 + FB62). This reduction exceeded that observed for the control Lactobacillus, L. paracasei 21060 (1h sn b21060 + FB62).

[00186] Esses dados sugeriram que ambos L. paracasei CBA L74 e o sobrenadante da cultura de L. paracasei CBA L74 possuem propriedades anti- inflamatrias que podem mitigar a inflamao induzida pelo patgeno bacteriano Salmonella typhimurium. Exemplo 18: Efeito do leite fermentado por L. paracasei CBA L74 na produo de IL-10 em clulas dendrticas derivadas de moncitos (MoDCs) na presena de Salmonella typhimurium[00186] These data suggested that both L. paracasei CBA L74 and the culture supernatant of L. paracasei CBA L74 have anti-inflammatory properties that can mitigate the inflammation induced by the bacterial pathogen Salmonella typhimurium. Example 18: Effect of milk fermented by L. paracasei CBA L74 on the production of IL-10 in monocyte-derived dendritic cells (MoDCs) in the presence of Salmonella typhimurium

[00187] Ns testamos a habilidade do leite fermentado por L. paracasei CBA L74 de induzir a produo da citocina anti-inflamatria, IL-10, em MoDCs humanas na presena do patgeno bacteriano, Salmonella typhimurium. Os resultados desse experimento foram apresentados na Figura 32. Embora MoDCs no ativadas geralmente no produzam IL-10, descobrimos que a incubao de MoDCs com leite fermentado por L. paracasei CBA L74 induziu a produo de IL-10 dependente da dose (vide a matriz CBAL74, 1,41gr/100ml e a matriz CBAL74 0,14gr/100ml). A capacidade foi retida at mesmo na presena de Salmonella typhimurium (vide a matriz CBAL74 1,41gr/100ml + FB62 e a matriz CBAL74 0,14gr/100ml + FB62).[00187] We tested the ability of milk fermented by L. paracasei CBA L74 to induce the production of the anti-inflammatory cytokine, IL-10, in human MoDCs in the presence of the bacterial pathogen, Salmonella typhimurium. The results of this experiment are shown in Figure 32. Although non-activated MoDCs generally do not produce IL-10, we found that incubating MoDCs with milk fermented by L. paracasei CBA L74 induced dose-dependent IL-10 production (see CBAL74 matrix, 1.41gr / 100ml and the CBAL74 matrix 0.14gr / 100ml ). The capacity was retained even in the presence of Salmonella typhimurium (see CBAL74 matrix 1.41gr / 100ml + FB62 and CBAL74 matrix 0.14gr / 100ml + FB62 ).

[00188] A Figura 32 tambm demonstra que a L. paracasei CBA L74 que havia sido ativada por calor (6,3*106 UFC CBA74 fervida), tratamento com paraformaldedo (6,3*106 UFC CBA74 PFA) ou congelamento-descongelamento (6,3*106 UFC CBA74 F&ampT) reteve a habilidade de induzir IL-10.[00188] Figure 32 also demonstrates that L. paracasei CBA L74 that had been activated by heat (6.3 * 106 UFC CBA74 boiled), treatment with paraformaldehyde (6.3 * 106 UFC CBA74 PFA) or freeze-thaw (6.3 * 106 UFC CBA74 F & ampT) retained the ability to induce IL-10.

[00189] Como observado para o meio de cultura de L. paracasei CBA L74, o leite fermentado por L. paracasei CBA L74 causou uma reduo significativa dependente da dose na produo de Il-12p70 induzida pela Salmonella typhimurium. (Figura 33). O leite fermentado por S. thermophilus causou aumento na produo de Il-12p70 na presena de Salmonella typhimurium.[00189] As observed for the culture medium of L. paracasei CBA L74, milk fermented by L. paracasei CBA L74 caused a significant dose-dependent reduction in the production of Il-12p70 induced by Salmonella typhimurium. (Figure 33). Milk fermented by S. thermophilus caused an increase in the production of Il-12p70 in the presence of Salmonella typhimurium.

[00190] Entretanto, o leite fermentado por L. paracasei CBA L74 no estimulou a produo de IL-12p70, de forma consistente com as propriedades anti- inflamatrias de L. paracasei CBA L74. Esses dados sugerem que L. paracasei CBA L74 reteve suas propriedades anti-inflamatrias at mesmo na presena de mais espcies pr-inflamatrias. Exemplo 19: Efeito dos sobrenadantes da clula de L. paracasei CBA L74 na produo de IL-10 e IL-12p70 em clulas dendrticas derivadas de moncitos (MoDCs) na presena de Enterobacter sakazaki[00190] However, milk fermented by L. paracasei CBA L74 did not stimulate the production of IL-12p70, consistent with the anti-inflammatory properties of L. paracasei CBA L74. These data suggest that L. paracasei CBA L74 retained its anti-inflammatory properties even in the presence of more pro-inflammatory species. Example 19: Effect of L. paracasei CBA L74 cell supernatants on the production of IL-10 and IL-12p70 in monocyte-derived dendritic cells (MoDCs) in the presence of Enterobacter sakazaki

[00191] Ns testamos a habilidade dos sobrenadantes da clula de L. paracasei CBA L74 de induzir a produo da citocina anti-inflamatria, IL-10, e da citocina pr-inflamatria, IL-12p70, em MoDCs humanas na presena do patgeno bacteriano, Enterobacter sakazaki. Ns testamos duas cepas de E. sakazaki, N9 e N13. E. sakazaki induziu a produo de IL-10 e IL-12p70 nas MoDCs humanas. A adio de sobrenadantes da clula de L. paracasei CBA L74 resultou em um aumento em IL-10 e reduo significativa em IL-12p70. Exemplo 20: Efeito do arroz fermentado por L. paracasei CBA L74 na produo de citocina em um modelo tecidual explantado na presena de Salmonella typhimurium[00191] We tested the ability of L. paracasei CBA L74 cell supernatants to induce the production of the anti-inflammatory cytokine, IL-10, and the pro-inflammatory cytokine, IL-12p70, in human MoDCs in the presence of the bacterial pathogen , Enterobacter sakazaki. We tested two strains of E. sakazaki, N9 and N13. E. sakazaki induced the production of IL-10 and IL-12p70 in human MoDCs. The addition of L. paracasei CBA L74 cell supernatants resulted in an increase in IL-10 and a significant reduction in IL-12p70. Example 20: Effect of rice fermented by L. paracasei CBA L74 on cytokine production in a tissue model explanted in the presence of Salmonella typhimurium

[00192] Epitlio do intestino de camundongo, conforme utilizado para configurar o sistema tridimensional de cultura conjunta, conforme descrito em Abud (Exp. Cell Res. 303: 252-262 (2005)). Explantes de tecido foram cultivados por 24 horas na presena de 100% de O2 com uma presso de uma atmosfera. A cmara inferior continha 1 mL de hEC DMEM mais ITS-X e EGF.[00192] Mouse intestine epithelium, as used to configure the three-dimensional system of joint culture, as described in Abud (Exp. Cell Res. 303: 252-262 (2005)). Tissue explants were cultured for 24 hours in the presence of 100% O2 with an atmosphere pressure. The lower chamber contained 1 ml of hEC DMEM plus ITS-X and EGF.

[00193] A cmara superior continha 200 ml de meio mais S. typhimurium, arroz fermentado por L. paracasei CBA L74, ou uma combinao de S. typhimurium e arroz fermentado por L. paracasei CBA L74. Os sobrenadantes foram colhidos e os nveis de IL-1, TNF- e IL-10 foram avaliados por ELISA. Conforme demonstrado na Figura 33, a adio de arroz fermentado reduziu significativamente a produo das citocinas pr-inflamatrias IL-1 e TNF- na presena de S. typhimurium, com apenas um efeito moderado nos nveis da citocina anti- inflamatria, IL-10.[00193] The upper chamber contained 200 ml of medium plus S. typhimurium, rice fermented by L. paracasei CBA L74, or a combination of S. typhimurium and rice fermented by L. paracasei CBA L74. Supernatants were collected and the levels of IL-1, TNF- and IL-10 were assessed by ELISA. As shown in Figure 33, the addition of fermented rice significantly reduced the production of the pro-inflammatory cytokines IL-1 and TNF- in the presence of S. typhimurium, with only a moderate effect on the levels of the anti-inflammatory cytokine, IL-10 .
